_scenarios: You are taking a jet plane for a business appointment in Paris.
_choices: A flight that is often late in arriving in Paris. The flight is nonstop, and it is anticipated that it will be 50% full. Flight attendants are “warm and friendly” and you would have a choice of two movies for entertainment.

A flight that is almost never late in arriving in Paris. The plane will make two intermediate stops, and it is anticipated that the plane will be 90% full. Flight attendants are ‘cold and curt” and a full entertainment system is provided.
